Package ca.odell.glazedlists.calculation

Interface Summary
Calculation<N> It is sometimes desirable to compute single values from an entire List of objects.
 

Class Summary
AbstractCalculation<N> Eases the burdens of implementing any type of Calculation.
AbstractCompositeCalculation<N extends Number> Advanced Calculations can be derived by combining many smaller Calculations together using a formula.
AbstractEventListCalculation<N,E> The transition between an EventList and a single calculated value based on information from each element of the EventList happens in subclasses of this class.
Calculations
